title: Summit Context Envelope
description: Standardized container for agent interactions to ensure determinism and auditability.

actor.description: Identity of the agent or user (e.g., 'agent:governance', 'user:jules')

run_id.description: Unique trace ID for the execution session

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of creation. Exclude from content hash if possible.

inputs.description: The arguments, prompt, or parameters provided.

refs.description: References to external artifacts, policies, or evidence IDs.
